classes.description: Show details about an object storage container
classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to see details for the ${containername} object storage container (yes or no)?
texts: Give me details on an object storage container
Details on the object storage container
Present the object storage container details

parameters.name: containername
parameters.title: container name
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the container?

classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to list the object storage containers (yes or no)?
texts: Show me the object storage containers
What are the object storage containers

classes.description: Retrieve an object from object storage container
classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to retrieve ${objectname} from the ${containername} object storage container (yes or no)?
texts: Retrieve my object from a container
Get an object from the container
Can I get the object from my container

parameters.name: containername
parameters.title: container name
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the container?

parameters.name: objectname
parameters.title: object name
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the object?

classes.description: Search for an object from object storage container
classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to search object storage for ${searchphrase} (yes or no)?
texts: Search for an object in a container
Find a file in a container
Can I get the file from my storage

parameters.name: searchphrase
parameters.title: search phrase
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the search phrase?

classes.confirmprompt: Would you like help with object storage (yes or no)?
texts: I need help on the objectstorage command
